product_name: e.l.f. CosmeticsHoly Hydration! Face Cream SPF 30
summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVegane.l.f. SKIN's Holy Hydration! Face Cream SPF 30 is a lightweight, ingredient-driven moisturizer that nourishes and plumps skin while delivering lasting hydration and SPF 30 protection.
details: DetailsBenefitsReplenishes lost moisture for supple skinOffers Broad Spectrum SPF 30 protectionBrightens and evens out skin toneInstantly absorbs into skinLightweight and non-greasyFresh, clean scentGreat for all skin typesProud to be 100% vegan and cruelty-free, worldwide. Because kindness is chic.Key IngredientsBroad Spectrum SPF 30 - Protects skin from harsh UVA/UVB raysHyaluronic Acid - Locks in moisture for a plump complexionNiacinamide - Minimizes pores and evens out skin tonePeptides - Promotes collagen and improves skin textureFormulated WithoutPhthalatesParabensNonylphenol EthoxylatesTriclosan,TriclocarbanHydroquinoneSulfatesItem 2582406How To UseUse in the AM and apply a generous amount onto clean ski as the last step in your skincare routine. Great to use alone, apply before makeup to help prep and prime skin for perfect application. Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure.IngredientsActive: Avobenzene 3.0%, Homosalate 9.0%, Octisalate 5.0%, Octocrylene 7.0%. Inactive:Water (Aqua), Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-3 Distearate, Niacinamide, Aluminum Starch Octenylsuccinate, Trehalose, Stearyl Heptanoate, Silica, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Squalane, Butylene Glycol, Stearic Acid, Cetearyl Olivate, Sorbitan Olivate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Dimethicone, Acrylates/Polytrimethylsiloxymethacrylate Copolymer, Disodium EDTA, Polyacrylate-13, Polyisobutene, Polysorbate 20, Carbomer, Fragrance(Parfum), Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Geraniol, Linalool.
how_to_use: Use in the AM and apply a generous amount onto clean ski as the last step in your skincare routine. Great to use alone, apply before makeup to help prep and prime skin for perfect application. Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure.

reviews.headline: Mostly fine, a litle oily
reviews.comments: I've been trying to find a new SPF 30 moisturizer and this one is...fine...but it definitely emphasizes how oily my skin gets generally. I wish it was in a pump or tube rather than scooping it out. It hydrates but maybe too much for me! It would probably be great for someone with combo or drier skin!

reviews.headline: I will most definitely be buying this product going forward.
reviews.comments: I never knew just how much my face and skin would absolutely enjoy how wonderful my face, chin, and neck would feel using this elf face cream. I Love it ðŸ’¯ and will never ever stop using it.

reviews.headline: Good product!
reviews.comments: I liked this moisturizer when I used it but I just felt like it wasn't enough for my dry skin:( It is a great moisturizer for normal skin for sure but my dry patches still remained after multiple layers of this over it:(

reviews.headline: thick & breakouts
reviews.comments: It was way to thick, did not seem fragrance free & broke out my skin & my teen daughter's.

reviews.headline: Smells like sunscreen
reviews.comments: This product feels the same as spraying banana boat over your face, but its a nice smooth moisturizer so im not mad at it

reviews.headline: SPF makes EYES WATER !!!!
reviews.comments: I wanted to love it , on application made my skin look moisturized but if you apply it too close to your under eyes they will water. Despite that i kept it on underneath my makeup and it was an issue the entire day.

reviews.headline: Just ok
reviews.comments: I love the original formulation if the E.L.F holy hydration. But, with summer I thought heck yea moisturizer and SPF combined! I like this product but I don't love it. The consistency is thicker than the original. I also felt it took significantly more time for this to blend in and absorb. I do plan to use this for the summer, but will for sure go back to the original once I've completed this bottle.

reviews.headline: I like but not love
reviews.comments: So I love that this has SPF, big plus. I was looking for a hydration moisturizer however this is a bit thick. I should have known since they called it Face Cream. I don't mind it as a Night cream. It's just too heavy for day wear.

reviews.headline: This is just sunscreen
reviews.comments: I don't underatand most of these reviews. This feels, smells, and wears like sunscreen making my gace super oily (and im a dry girlie). It is horrible compared to every moisturizer with spf ive tried. I wanted hydration with the bonus of spf, but i think this is litteraly banana boat in a tub.

reviews.headline: Better than any skin tint and perfect for summer
reviews.comments:
I've been using the e.l.f. Holy Hydration! Face Cream with SPF and honestly, I love it. It's super hydrating without being heavy or sticky, and it doesn't feel like you're wearing sunscreen at allâ€”which is rare. It feels just like a nice face cream, not tacky or greasy like some SPF products.

One of my favorite things about it is how easy it is to reapply. I like to reapply sunscreen throughout the day, so having it in this cream format just makes senseâ€”it's convenient and feels good on the skin. The fragrance is subtle and pleasant, and it leaves my skin looking fresh and healthy.

For me, this works even better than a skin tint with SPF. With skin tints, you usually need to apply a thick layer to get proper sun protection, and that just ends up looking off, especially on textured or acne-prone skin like mine. With this cream, I can just apply my regular amount, get hydration and sun protection, and then spot-conceal any areas if I want extra coverage.

I have sensitive, acne-prone, and textured skin, and this cream hasn't irritated it at all. I don't wear makeup every day, but I do wear this every single day. It's become a staple in my routine.

reviews.headline: I will continue to buy this product!
reviews.comments: I love that it has SPF 30. What a bonus!

reviews.headline: Excellent Moisturizer and Sunblock
reviews.comments: This product has helped my skin so  much. I have very dry skin. Most sunblocks only focus on doing the job of keeping your skin from getting a sunburn. This product goes above and beyond the call of duty by also being a very good moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Very nice moisturizer with SPF
reviews.comments: Keeps moisture in and having spf 30 is a bonus!!

reviews.headline: High quality for the price
reviews.comments: This is a moisterizer I have repurchased a few times, and am always pleasantly surprised. While it is not the richest moisterizer, which I prefer for night time, it is great for day time use, especially for oily skin. It's very light and airy, and super hydrating. My skin feels like it takes a big drink of water when I use this. I have combination skin and a history of cystic acne, and find this to be good fo sensitive skin and doe snot clog pores or feel heavy. The reason I am rating this 4/5 is because I think it could be slightly richer. I seem to go through this jar more frequently than other moisterizers.

reviews.headline: Too Much Like a Sunscreen
reviews.comments: I've tried other daily moisturizers with SPF 30, and they still felt like moisturizers. This one feels very much like sunscreen and also smells like it. It is only ok for hydration, and doesn't feel as gentle on the skin as other similar products I tried.

reviews.headline: Such a lightweight sunscreen
reviews.comments: Will be buying again. I have ance prone skin but this doesnt seem to both it at all

reviews.headline: Sunscreen Reaction
reviews.comments: I usually love ELF, but the SPF in the burned my eyes so bad! I was careful to keep it way from my eyes, but the fumes from it still burned my eyes even after I washed my face to remove it! For hours my eyes watered and burned. I will never use this again!

reviews.headline: Didn't work for me
reviews.comments: I had an alergic reaction to it unfortunately. But it works really well for a sister of mine with less sensitive skin lol.

reviews.headline: Great moisturizer with sunscreen
reviews.comments: I bought this for the spf tbh, it's not greasy and does not leave a cast, blends in well with minimal effort. It's lightweight and spreads easily, it does make you teary a bit so avoid rubbing your eyes while you have this on.

reviews.headline: Beware if you're sensitive
reviews.comments: I wanted to love this, I went through a whole jar of the non scented version without SPF in it. I've tried it many times and every single time it burns the heck out of my eyes. I'm not sure if it is the fragrance or the SPF but I was bummed ðŸ˜”

media.headline: Holy hydrstion face cream
media.caption: Great size jar! Beautiful  product. Highly recommended

media.headline: W O W
media.caption: A lot bigger than i thought!

faceoff_positive.comments: I purchased this cream when it launched. I have been using this face cream every day. I have combo to oily skin,  and this product does not make my face more oily.  It has a thick consistency and works well under makeup.
faceoff_positive.headline: Absorbs into the skin quickly

faceoff_negative.comments: Purchased the "Holy hydration broad spectrum spf 30 sunscreen" less than two weeks ago and the lid already broke off. I've purchased elf products for the past 14 years and not once had an issue until recentlyâ€¦
faceoff_negative.headline: Bad packaging
